subject: p19454978
Findings: AP upright portable view of the chest was obtained. There are small bilateral pleural effusions with overlying atelectasis. No definite focal consolidation is seen. There is no pneumothorax. The aorta is calcified and tortuous. The cardiac silhouette is mildly enlarged.
Impression: Small bilateral pleural effusions with persistent mild enlargement of the cardiac silhouette.
